welcome_message:
ğŸ‘‹ Welcome to ChatGpt Claude Mistral Bot!

This bot allows you to chat with multiple AI models including OpenAI's ChatGPT, Anthropic's Claude, and Mistral AI.

You can also generate images using AI.

Use /help to see available commands.
help_message:
ğŸ“š **Available Commands**

/start - Start the bot
/help - Show this help message
/settings - Configure bot settings
/balance - Check your token balance
/models - Select AI model
/language - Change language
/subscribe - Purchase tokens

To chat with AI, simply send a message.
To generate an image, start your message with '/image' followed by your description.
